name: Rusto's Adventure - Heart Jam 2018 Submission
description:
Rusto's Adventure is my submission for Heart Jam 2018. The theme for the jam was "scarcity".

In Rusto's Adventure, you play as Rusto the robot scavenger. Explore a mysterious ancient cave in search of Bits, the robot currency of the future. The ancient technology in the cave can only be activated with oil, something that is rarely found in the future - luckily, Rusto carries his trusty oil tank!

Rusto's Adventure is a platform / puzzle adventure game with 18 levels to explore. The game took approximately 52 hours to complete, with around 24 hours' actual work. All the art, design, coding, etc. was done by me. Sound effects and music are from freesound.org.

Gameplay GIF: https://giphy.com/gifs/9MITCznLkaAMDgEgWE/html5
